Description: Pottery ostracon with text containing a memorandum of payments.
Curator's comments: Published in Delattre, CdE 85 (2010), p. 369-373 no. 3.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.128-29, pl.88)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82845) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82845)
Condition: incomplete,fragmentary (one fragment only); good (faded in places)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 88:5 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
